product_title: Dr.Melaxin Peel Shot Glow Black Rice Peeling Ampoule 80ml, Dead Skin Gentle Exfoliating Ampoule with Rice Water Extract, AHA BHA, Niacinamide, Daily Skin Texture Care, All Skin Types, Korean Skincare

overall_perception_summary.headline: Viral Clinical Validation
overall_perception_summary.description: Dr.Melaxin successfully merges the authority of the dermatology clinic with the velocity of TikTok. It democratizes professional-grade results ('Peel Shot') by using high-intensity social proof ('100M views', 'Cardi B') to validate a clinical mechanism. It satisfies the modern consumer's need for both 'Doctor' credibility and 'Insider' viral status.

foundation.title: The Empowered Clinic
foundation.description: The brand anchors its authority in the clinic (Dr.Melaxin) but directs that power toward psychological uplift (Glass Skin). It adheres to Radical Transparency, using visceral evidence ('Real Dead Skin' visuals) to prove its claims. The positioning is The Medical Authority, but updated for the digital age—accessible, fast, and highly visible.

identity.title: The Viral Doctor
identity.description: The personality is The Trendsetter, borrowing the swagger of 'Cardi B' and 'TikTok Shop' popularity while maintaining a clinical backbone. The archetype mix is driven by The Magician (transformation), validated by The Ruler (clinical stats), and energized by The Jester (viral fun). Visually, it uses Pharma-Code aesthetics (charts, red targets) to ground the hype in science.

communication.title: Evidence-Based Hype
communication.description: Messaging is locked on The Problem Solver territory, identifying specific pain (dead skin) and offering a rational fix. The USP is The Ingredient King, banking on 'Black Rice' as the hero. It relies on Viral Results for KSPs—trusting the crowd ('100M views') as much as the chart. The Focus is Science Education, teaching the user exactly how the peeling works.

benefits.title: Corrective Intelligence
benefits.description: Functionally, it is The Fixer, aggressively correcting texture and pores for an Aesthetic outcome. Emotionally, it delivers Intelligence—the feeling of being a 'savvy' consumer who found the viral solution. Socially, it is The Safe Choice—buying it aligns you with the massive majority who have already validated it.

marker_1.reasoning: While the origin is 'Dr.Melaxin' (Clinical), the mission is clearly about aesthetic enhancement ('Glow', 'Glass Skin'). The PDP focuses on 'removing dead skin' not just to heal, but to reveal a 'visibly brighter' complexion. This combination of clinical roots directed toward aesthetic perfection maps to The Empowerer.
marker_1.evidence: Dr.Melaxin... visibly brighter, clearer complexion... Peel Shot Glow... Transforms skin into a clean and healthy texture
marker_1.slider_a_label: [SLIDER] ORIGIN OF AUTHORITY (The Source of Power)

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Low Origin (Clinical) + High Mission (Enhancement) maps to Territory 4 (Empowerer) per the grid.

marker_2.reasoning: The brand takes a professional treatment ('Peel Shot') and makes it accessible ('#1 Beauty Best Seller', $22.50). The scope is personal optimization ('Dead Skin Gentle Exfoliating'), and the barriers are low, targeting 'All Skin Types' and utilizing mass platforms like TikTok Shop.
marker_2.evidence: Dead Skin Gentle Exfoliating Ampoule... #1 Beauty Best Seller... TikTok Shop... $22.50

marker_3.reasoning: The PDP is obsessed with proving efficacy through data and visceral visuals. It shows '178% improvement' and 'Real Dead Skin' targets. It sacrifices mystique for hard evidence, listing percentages and showing the 'pushed-out real dead skin' to prove it works.
marker_3.evidence: Improves Blackheads 178%... This is pushed-out real dead skin... Clinical results show improvement... REAL DEAD SKIN

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: High Performance + High Data/Evidence = Radical Transparency.

marker_4.reasoning: Despite the viral hype, the core positioning is anchored in the pharmacy. The name 'Dr.Melaxin,' the 'Ampoule' format, and the 'Clinical' bar charts signal medical authority. It positions itself as a daily utility ('Daily Skin Texture Care') backed by science, rather than a luxury item.
marker_4.evidence: Dr.Melaxin... Ampoule... Clinical results... Skin texture improvement... 178% reduction

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Clinical Aesthetic + Utility/Essential Value = The Medical Authority.

marker_5.reasoning: The brand pairs its medical credentials with high-energy 'Hype' behaviors. '100M+ TikTok Viral Views', '#1 Best Seller', and 'Cardi B's Pick' create a personality that is authoritative but buzz-driven. It's the cool doctor who knows what's trending.
marker_5.evidence: 100M+ TikTok Viral Views... Cardi B's Pick... No.1 Beauty Best Seller... TikTok Shop

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: High Warmth/Energy + Mid Authority = The Trendsetter.

marker_6.reasoning: The brand promises radical, visible transformation ('178% improvement,' 'Glass Skin') which is pure Magician energy. This is grounded by Ruler authority ('Dr.Melaxin,' 'Authenticity Warning') and spiked with Jester virality ('TikTok,' 'Cardi B') to make it fun.
marker_6.evidence: Improves Blackheads 178%... Transforms skin... Dr.Melaxin... 100M+ TikTok Viral Views

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Archetype mix dominance maps to The Performer territory.

marker_7.reasoning: The volume is turned up high. With claims like '100M+ Viral Views,' 'Cardi B's Pick,' and '#1 Best Seller,' the tone is shouting success. It uses high enthusiasm to generate excitement, overriding the otherwise clinical subject matter.
marker_7.evidence: 100M+ TikTok Viral Views... #1 Bestselling... Cardi B's Pick... REAL DEAD SKIN!

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Enthusiasm 5/5 automatically maps to The Hype Beast.

marker_8.reasoning: Despite the viral context, the core visual language is pharmaceutical. Grids, red clinical targets, chemical molecule diagrams, and bar charts dominate the imagery. It signals 'Lab' first, even if it adds a 'TikTok' sticker on top.
marker_8.evidence: Clinical Highlight... Molecular Matrix... Red crosshair target... Bar charts... Dr.Melaxin
marker_8.look_and_feel: Clinical rigor meets viral energy; pharmaceutical grids and red targets mixed with celebrity cutouts.
marker_8.primary_palette: Stark clinical white and black with deep medical red accents for efficacy signaling.

marker_9.reasoning: The hook is the result: 'Peel Shot,' 'Dead Skin Removal.' It identifies a specific problem (dead skin/pores) and offers a rational, mechanism-based solution ('Gommage Peeling'). The persuasion is data-driven but focused on the functional outcome.
marker_9.evidence: Peel Shot... Dead Skin Gentle Exfoliating... Removes dead skin cells... Improves Blackheads

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Result Hook + Rational Persuasion = The Problem Solver.

marker_10.reasoning: The protagonist is the 'Dr.' brand (Scientist/Professional). The setting is heavily 'Lab' coded via molecular diagrams and clinical testing charts. Even with the 'Black Rice' ingredient, the story is about the scientific extraction and formulation ('Peel Shot') rather than a harvest ritual.
marker_10.evidence: Dr.Melaxin... Clinical results... Molecular Matrix... 178% improvement

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Professional Protagonist + Lab Setting = The Lab Breakthrough.

marker_11.reasoning: The primary validator is the 'Fan' base ('100M+ Views', 'TikTok #1', 'Cardi B'). The proof is visual ('Real Dead Skin' photos) and statistical ('178%'). This combination of crowd validation and visual outcomes defines the Viral Results territory.
marker_11.evidence: 100M+ TikTok Viral Views... Cardi B's Pick... Real Dead Skin... Before/After

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Fans Validator + Stat/Visual Proof = Viral Results.

marker_12.reasoning: The USP is anchored in 'Black Rice' ('Key Ingredient: BLACK RICE'). While they mention the 'Peel Shot' mechanism, the branding tries to own Black Rice as the hero. The scope is broad ('All Skin Types'), positioning it as the category leader for this ingredient.
marker_12.evidence: Key Ingredient : BLACK RICE... Pentarice... All Skin Types... Daily Skin Texture Care
marker_12.slider_a_label: [SLIDER] THE OWNERSHIP CLAIM (What Makes You Unique)

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Hero Ingredient + Category Scope = The Ingredient King.

marker_13.reasoning: The PDP is heavy on education. It uses infographics to explain *how* the product works (molecular structures, gommage mechanism, skin layers). The goal is to build trust through explanation ('The Explainer') rather than just inspiration.
marker_13.evidence: Molecular Matrix... Cellular Penetration... Infographic... This is pushed-out real dead skin

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Explainer Depth + Evidence Intent = Science Education.

marker_14.reasoning: The function is aggressive correction ('Peel,' 'Exfoliate,' 'Remove'). But the outcome is purely aesthetic: 'Glow,' 'Glass Skin,' 'Poreless.' It fixes damage to create a perfect visual appearance.
marker_14.evidence: Improves Blackheads... Removes dead skin... Radiant Skin... Glass skin model photography

marker_15.reasoning: The emotional payoff is the feeling of being a 'Savvy' consumer. By buying the '#1 Viral' product that is also 'Clinically Proven,' the user feels smart. It validates their competence in finding the best solution.
marker_15.evidence: 100M+ TikTok Viral Views... #1 Best Seller... Cardi B's Pick... Authenticity Warning
marker_15.slider_a_position_name: ▼ Contentment (The feeling of a job well done)

marker_16.reasoning: Buying this product signals that you are 'plugged in.' The explicit 'TikTok Shop #1' and 'Cardi B' branding makes it a totem of current relevance. It says 'I know what is viral right now.'
marker_16.evidence: TikTok Shop #1... Cardi B's Pick... 100M+ Views
marker_16.slider_a_position_name: ▼ The Statement (I buy it to show my taste)

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Statement Signal + Trending Tribe = The Trend-Setter.

marker_17.reasoning: With '#1 Best Seller' and '100M Views,' the social signal is overwhelmingly 'Safety in Numbers.' The user joins the Massive Majority who have already validated the product. It reduces social risk by proving universal acceptance.
marker_17.evidence: 100M+ TikTok Viral Views... #1 Beauty Best Seller... 8,003 global ratings
marker_17.slider_a_position_name: ▼ Acceptance (I want to be accepted by the group)

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Acceptance Vector + Majority Group = The Safe Choice.
